title: Spirits At Starbucks? | True Ghost Stories
description:
You don’t normally think of Starbucks as a “creepy” or “haunted” place. Until you hear what happens in this story about a Starbucks spirit that wants to be known. 

What do you do when the spirit that haunts your childhood home, shows up in the night as an “evil” version of your mother?

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:
